entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Duncan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:04 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the water in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the water in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
